formal_name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Majora's Mask 3D: Update
description:
An update for The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D is now available from Nintendo eShop.

All customers who own a copy of “The Legend of Zelda™: Majora's Mask 3D” should download the update.

This will update the software to Version 1.1 with the following amendments:

- Various bugs have been fixed in order to provide a smoother gaming experience.
name:
The Legend of Zelda™:
Majora's Mask 3D: Update
